messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
They won't go.
Do you have an emergency?
Yeah, I kind of do.
Okay. What is happening?
My girlfriend, she has this ex-boyfriend and he's been stalking her.
Okay, just a second. I'll be right back with you, okay?
Thank you.
Hello?
Okay, where is this happening?
He's following her right now. He will not leave her alone.
Where are you now?
44th and Wadsworth.
44th and Wadsworth. Okay. Is she in a car?
She's in a car, and he's following her. You can hear her crying in the background. He just will not leave her alone.
Okay. What kind of car is she in?
What kind of car are you in, Amber? It's a black Dodge Caliber.
And which way is she going? Is she going north on Wadsworth?
Which way are you going now, Amber? North or south? West on 44th right now, but she's about to turn left on Wadsworth.
Okay. Just keep driving. He's going to keep following you, Amber, but just keep driving, okay?
Is she going southbound on Wadsworth now?
Are you going southbound on Wadsworth now? Yes.
Okay, Chad, I have a stalker situation. He's following a girl. She's southbound on Wadsworth.
What happened? Just a second. I'll be right back with you.
You're not trapped? He's trapping you? He pulled in front of your car?
She's crying. I can't understand. What, Amber? He's trying to run you off the road?
Trying to run off the road? And is she still at 44th?
Where are you now? Wadsworth and what? Keep your door locked.
Where are you? What kind of car is he in? Do you know?
What kind of car is he in? You're hysterical. I don't hear her.
And is she still at 44th and Wadsworth?
Are you at 44th and Wadsworth? Amber? Amber?
Holy shit, I just lost her. She had just turned south down on Wadsworth from 44th.
The person I was talking to had her on the phone but lost contact.
I just told her that but lost her.
Okay. She's somewhere near there, 44th and Wadsworth.
What's her cell phone number?
303-547-4089. This guy has threatened her life.
Okay. Just a second. I'll be right back again, okay?
Okay. And your name?
My name is Alex.
And your phone number?
Okay. We've got officers on the way.
Holy shit. Okay.
Okay. Thanks, Alex.
Thank you. Bye-bye.
9-1-1, what's your emergency?
I'd like to report a car accident and shots fired.
Okay. Where did this happen?
Just after 38th Avenue going southbound on Wadsworth.
38th and Wadsworth?
Yes.
Are both cars still there?
No, one of the cars, a man pulled out. He looked to be in his mid-30s, and he was in a light Toyota truck. It looks like there's an officer on the scene right now.
Okay. Do you know what kind of car is involved in the accident?
I'm not sure. The other car that was present was a black Ford Contour driving southbound on Wadsworth. I'm going to let you go. I'll talk to the officer.
Okay.
Okay. Bye.
